request_init_local_storage_user_id_param

Declaration
public string request_init_local_storage_user_id_param
Field Value
Type Description
System.String

只写(选填), 初始化 Database 的用户 ID, 当 kTIMRequestInternalOperation 为 kTIMInternalOperationInitLocalStorage 时需要设置

CosSaveRegionForConversationParam

Declaration
public CustomServerInfo request_set_custom_server_info_param
Field Value
Type Description
CustomServerInfo

request_set_env_param

Declaration
public bool? request_set_env_param
Field Value
Type Description
System.Nullable<System.Boolean>

只写(选填), true 表示设置当前环境为测试环境，false表示设置当前环境是正式环境，默认是正式环境, 当 kTIMRequestInternalOperation 为 kTIMInternalOperationSetEnv 时需要设置

request_set_max_retry_count_param

Declaration
public int? request_set_max_retry_count_param
Field Value
Type Description
System.Nullable<System.Int32>

只写(选填), 设置登录、发消息的重试次数, 当 kTIMRequestInternalOperation 为 kTIMInternalOperationSetMaxRetryCount 时需要设置

Field Value
Type Description
SM4GCMCallbackParam

只写(选填), 国密 SM4 GCM 回调函数地址的参数, 当 kTIMRequestInternalOperation 为 kTIMInternalOperationSetSM4GCMCallback 时需要设置
